abstract: Moody’s Investors Service raised concerns on Monday about the bank’s recent move outside its comfort zone of consumer lending.
snippet: Moody’s Investors Service raised concerns on Monday about the bank’s recent move outside its comfort zone of consumer lending.
lead_paragraph: As Wells Fargo becomes a bigger player in the investment banking game, not everyone is a fan.

headline.main: Wells Fargo’s Play for Prime Brokerage Prompts Skepticism
